Member Function Documentation

bool UTransformCtx::execute (  )  [protected]

Executes transforms chain in ctx.

Returns: true on success or false otherwise.

UBaseTransform * UTransformCtx::nodeRead ( xmlNodePtr  node,
int  usage 
) [static, protected]

: the pointer to the transform's node. : the transform usage (signature, encryption, ...).

Reads transform from the as follows:

1) reads "Algorithm" attribute;

2) checks the lists of known and allowed transforms;

3) calls transform's read transform node method.

Returns: pointer to newly created transform or NULL if an error occurs.

bool UTransformCtx::verifyNodeContent ( UBaseTransform *  transform,
xmlNodePtr  node 
) [protected]

: the pointer to transform. : the pointer to node.

Gets the content, base64 decodes it and calls xmlSecTransformVerify function to verify binary results.

Returns: true on success or false if an error occurs.
